greeting: Hello, I'm your dental assistant bot. How can I help you?
smallTalk: I'm doing great, thank you! How can I assist you today?
price: The price for dental cleaning is 100 dollars.
address: We are located at 123 Main Street, Sacramento, California.
hours: Our operating hours are from 9 AM to 6 PM, Monday through Friday.
fallback: Hmm, I'm not entirely sureâ€”could you try rephrasing that? I'm still learning!
transferOperator: Alright, I'm transferring you to an operator.
services_list: We offer tooth extraction, filling, whitening, professional cleaning, appointment scheduling, insurance support and more. Which service would you like details on?
extraction_info: Our tooth extraction service is performed under local anesthesia. Price and details depend on the complexity of the procedure.
filling_info: Our dental filling service costs around 80 dollars and includes complete restoration of the affected tooth.
whitening_info: Our teeth whitening service costs 200 dollars and takes approximately 90 minutes.
cleaning_info: Our professional cleaning service costs 100 dollars and includes polishing, cleaning and X-rays.
insurance_info: We accept most insurance plans. Please provide your coverage details.
emergency_info: If this is an emergency, please call 911 immediately.
appointment: I can help you schedule an appointment. When would you like to come in?
repeat_request: I didn't catch that, could you repeat?
connect_operator: I'm still having trouble understanding. Let me connect you to an admin.
no_speech: Sorry, I'm still learning. I'll connect you to an operator.
empathy_response: No worries, friend! Our procedures are designed to be as comfortable and painless as possible.
farewells: Take care, have a wonderful day!
